features: 6.5" HD+ 90Hz Display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3. / Snapdragon 680 processor.
50MP sensor with Quad Pixel Photo Night Vision. / Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.
5,000mAh battery for up to 46 hours of battery life. / 64GB of storage + 1TB more with microSD card. / 4GB RAM, expandable up to 6GB with RAM Boost.

Carrier: This phone is locked to Tracfone, which means this device can only be used on the Tracfone wireless network. A Tracfone plan is required to activate this device. Activating is easy, upon receipt go to Tracfone Website and select “Activate” and follow the prompts.

Compatible with our no-contract Unlimited Talk & Text plus Data plans starting as low as $20/month plus taxes and fees. To find the Tracfone Plans available to purchase, please go to our TF - Amazon Brand Page linked below the product title.
